channel.title: Report an appeal question fo moparscape
channel.description:
were do i report an apeal in this forum.....i talked to the owner of the server ffarunescape.no-ip.biz and he said u must go on forums....is this the rite forum or there is another forum that has to do with moparscape....if it is the rite forum.. can someone tell me were can u appeal your moparscape acount because im desprate!!!!!!
thank you :confused:

item.title: Report an appeal question fo moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Zzz_O_zzZ Zzz O zzZ
item.description:
@Zzz_O_zzZ wrote:

Your forum account?

If it’s your account on a certain server, then you talk with the owner / hoster about it.

Read full topic
item.source: Report an appeal question fo moparscape
